fullq.subject: physics
fullq.question: Kepler's third law states that the square of a planet's period is proportional to the:
fullq.w_choice: cube of its average distance from the sun
fullq.x_choice: square root of its average distance from the sun
fullq.y_choice: cube of its average distance from its two neighboring planets
fullq.z_choice: square of its average distance from the sun

fullq.subject: physics
fullq.question: Order the following 4 categories of electromagnetic radiation from the LOWEST frequency to the HIGHEST: Ultraviolet, VHF TV, AM radio, radiation from 60 hertz AC current
fullq.answer: RADIATION FROM 60 HERTZ AC CURRENT; AM RADIO; VHF TV; ULTRAVIOLET

fullq.question: A substance's heat of sublimation at a given temperature is equal to which of the following at the same temperature:

fullq.z_choice: heat of fusion minus heat of vaporization

fullq.subject: chemistry
fullq.question: Order the following 4 acids from the strongest to the weakest: nitric acid; perchloric acid; hydrochloric acid; acetic acid
fullq.answer: PERCHLORIC ACID; HYDROCHLORIC ACID; NITRIC ACID; ACETIC ACID
